items.title: TechCorp Inc.
items.subtitle: Senior Software Developer
bullets: Led a team of *5 developers* in building scalable web applications using *React* and *Node.js*.
Implemented *CI/CD pipelines* that reduced deployment time by *40%* and improved code quality.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver *high-quality software* on time and within budget.
Mentored junior developers and conducted *code reviews* to maintain coding standards.

items.title: StartupXYZ
items.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
bullets: Developed and maintained *full-stack applications* using *Python*, *Django*, and *PostgreSQL*.
Built *RESTful APIs* that served over *100,000 requests* per day with *99.9% uptime*.
Optimized database queries resulting in *50% faster* page load times.
Implemented *automated testing* that increased code coverage from *60% to 85%*.

items.title: WebDev Agency
items.subtitle: Frontend Developer
bullets: Created *responsive web designs* for over *20 client projects* using *HTML5*, *CSS3*, and *JavaScript*.
Collaborated with designers to implement *pixel-perfect* UI components.
Improved website performance by *optimizing assets* and implementing *lazy loading*.

items.title: Programming Languages

items.title: TaskManager Pro
items.subtitle: Project Management Tool
bullets: A *full-stack project management* application built with *React* and *Node.js*.
Features include *real-time collaboration*, *file sharing*, and *advanced analytics*.
Used by over *1,000 active users* with *4.8/5 star* rating.

items.title: CloudSync API
items.subtitle: Cloud Storage Service
bullets: A *scalable cloud storage API* built with *Go* and *PostgreSQL*.
Handles *millions of file operations* daily with *sub-second response times*.
Implemented *end-to-end encryption* for secure file storage.

items.title: DevTools Extension
items.subtitle: Browser Extension
bullets: A *Chrome extension* for developers that provides *advanced debugging* capabilities.
Downloaded over *50,000 times* with *4.9/5 star* rating on Chrome Web Store.
Built with *TypeScript* and *React* for optimal performance.
